title: The Rockefeller Family Estate Expands to Include New Artists and Audiences
description: The new David Rockefeller Creative Arts Center at the Pocantico Center in Tarrytown, N.Y., aims to bring new artists, audiences and life to the Rockefeller family estate.
dc:creator: Hilarie M. Sheets
media:credit: John Muggenborg for The New York Times
media:description: “Inspired Encounters: Women Artists and the Legacies of Modern Art,” includes 20th century artists like Lenore Tawney, whose collage from 1967 anchors the entrance.
